Claudia Shear https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claudia_Shear 0 Claudia Shear (born September 12, 1962) is an American actress and playwright. She was nominated for the Tony Award, Best Play and Best Actress for her play Dirty Blonde. Claudia_Shear ( born September_12_,_1962 ) is an_American_actress_and_playwright . She was_nominated for the_Tony_Award , Best_Play and Best_Actress for her_play_Dirty_Blonde .
